cz.artin.hackathon.simulator

Interface Team


  • public interface Team
    Provides team properties and drivers. You implement it to enter a race. One (and only one) of your teams should be marked as the OfficialTeam. That one will be used for hackathon races.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Driver> createDrivers(int count)
      Creates a list of drivers of your team.
      cz.artin.hackathon.simulator.CarColor getColor()
      Color of the cars of your team.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Name of the team (your choice).

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Name of the team (your choice).

      • getColor

        cz.artin.hackathon.simulator.CarColor getColor()
        Color of the cars of your team. Don't change please.

      • createDrivers

        java.util.List<Driver> createDrivers(int count)
        Creates a list of drivers of your team. Most often you'll need only one driver, but some race types may ask for more drivers of each team. You may e.g. use the first car as the fastest one and the rest to block the other cars.
        Parameters:
        count - how many drivers you should return
